item.title: Step 1. Create a new XContext
item.description: Create a new XContext named "membersCtx.bucx" using the New File wizard.

item.title: Step 2. Set the content of courseCtx.bucx
item.description:
Set the content of "membersCtx.bucx" as follows.
context memebersCtx
sets MEM
axioms
@axm0_1: "finite(MEM)"
end

item.title: Step 3. Auto-format the code
item.description: Automatically format the content of "membersCtx.bucx" by using short-cut (e.g., on Mac OS: Cmd+Shift+F).
